#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
#include<cmath>

using namespace std;

typedef long long int LL;

int main()
{
    #ifdef pooja
    freopen("D:\\CODING\\CC\\in.txt","r",stdin);
    freopen("D:\\CODING\\CC\\out.txt","w",stdout);
    freopen("D:\\CODING\\CC\\out.txt","w",stderr);
    #endif

    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        LL n,ans;
        scanf("%lld",&n);
//        for(int i = 1;i <= n;i++)
//        {
//            int temp = 0;
//            for(int j = 1;j <= n;j++)
//            {
//                if(i % j == 0){ if(temp == 0)temp = 1; else temp = 0;}
//            }
//            if(temp == 1) ans++;
//        }
        ans = sqrt(n);
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
